duties_responsibilities.duty: Design and develop user-centric experiences for web and mobile applications using Figma.
Create wireframes, prototypes, and mockups to visualize and communicate design concepts.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to align design solutions with business objectives and user needs.
Conduct user research and usability testing to gather feedback and iterate on designs.
Stay up-to-date with industry trends and best practices in UX/Product design.
